channel.title: How do u code? and start a server?
channel.description:
can sum1 tell me how to code cause i want to be able to start my server, and if any1 could answer thses questions...
1. how do u code..
2. how do u make a private server a. if so is it free b. easy c. can a noob (say under 15yrs of age) make one
3. if im able to get a server up u think i can get a coder?
* dont tell me turitals, i dont get them.....
plz answer thses questions sumbody. and if u have an answer 4 one but no all type the answer to the question and the number of the question in front of the answer...

item.title: How do u code? and start a server?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

  1. How do you code? (Answer: Coding takes weeks, to months, to years to learn. Especially Java.)

  2. How do you make a private server? (Answer: You need to know how to code and from what I know, you know nothing of.)
    a. If so is it free? (Answer: Yes, but some stuff (Like ready made sources, and files for the source.)
    b. Is it easy? (Answer: If you know how to code and know what your doing.)
    c. Can a noob (say under 15 years of age) make one? (Answer: Doesn’t have an age limit, just by the amount of experience. Anyone can make a server, but only a few people can make a good one.)

  3. If I’m able to get a server up do youu think I can get a coder? (Answer: If they are willing to code for you then sure.)

Read full topic
item.source: How do u code? and start a server?
